Content.Text:
<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Hey! What're you doing? Get over here!

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah, sorry. It's my first time, so I keep
getting distracted by things.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It really is your first time, isn't it.
I was surprised when you asked me to
bring you here.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I guess it was unexpected. Sorry.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Don't worry about it. Come on, let's sit
down.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Clement, can you bring us a menu please?

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome, welcome! What do you want?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll have the usual. What about you?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Let me see...

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
...Just a moment.
<PAGE>
Okay, I'll have the omelet rice.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Very good. It'll be just a moment!

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
I know what omelet rice is, but
everything else on the menu... I have
no idea what any of it is!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I don't think the menu is anything
that special, but... okay. No problem.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let's eat!

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Sure.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
...It's good.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Like I said! All the food here is great.
I could eat here every day.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
It really is good. Sanjay's cooking is
good too, but this... this has a real
depth of flavor.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey, don't just analyze it, eat it!
It'll be a waste if it gets cold.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Y-Yes, of course.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you. You've helped me have a
unique new experience.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I didn't do anything, trust me. All we
did was eat together, right?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's enough to make a difference to
someone with such a sheltered life as my
own. Thank you.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You're making too much of it! Just come
and eat here again. You'll settle into
it soon enough.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yes, I'll do that. I'd like you to
recommend something for me to eat next
time, too.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I can, if you like. Any time you want to
eat here, just let me know.
